messages.content: Hi! ðŸ‘‹ I'm your automation consultant. I help businesses eliminate repetitive tasks and scale efficiently. What brings you here today?
We're spending way too much time onboarding new customers manually. It's taking over our team's schedule.
I totally get that - manual onboarding can be a huge time sink! How many customers are you onboarding per week, and what does your current process look like?
About 20-30 per week. We have to create their accounts, set up permissions, send welcome emails, add them to HubSpot, create documentation... each one takes 2-3 hours.
That's 40-90 hours per week! Definitely worth automating. What tools are you currently using for this process?
We use our own authentication system for accounts, HubSpot for CRM, Mailchimp for emails, and Google Docs for documentation.
Perfect - all of those have great APIs we can work with. Does your authentication system have an API we can use to create accounts programmatically?
Yes, it's a custom system built on Node.js with a REST API.
Excellent! And do your customers fall into different tiers or plans that affect their setup?
Yes, we have Basic, Pro, and Enterprise tiers. Each has different permissions and resources.

Got it. So we'd automate: account creation with tier-specific permissions, HubSpot updates, personalized welcome emails, and documentation delivery. That would reduce your manual work by about 90%. What's your timeline for getting this in place?
ASAP! We're growing fast and can't keep hiring people just for onboarding. Ideally within a month?

We can definitely do that - this would be about a 3-4 week project. For something like this with multiple integrations, custom logic, and a dashboard, we're typically looking at $5,500-7,000. Does that fit within your budget?
Yes, that works. When we're saving 40-90 hours per week, the ROI is immediate.
Absolutely! That's about $2,000-4,500 per week in saved time at typical hourly rates. Let me put together a detailed quote for you. Can I get your name and email?
Sarah Johnson, sarah.johnson@techstart.com
Perfect! And what's your company name?
TechStart Solutions

Awesome, Sarah! I'm going to create a detailed quote for you that includes account provisioning, email sequences, HubSpot integration, a real-time dashboard, and automated documentation. You'll have it in your inbox within the next few minutes. Sound good?
Perfect, thank you!
You're welcome! Check your email shortly. I'm excited to help TechStart automate and scale! ðŸš€

project.problem: Manual customer onboarding taking 2-3 hours per customer
project.urgency: High - ASAP, ideally within a month
project.tech_familiarity: High - have custom built system with API
